website_summaries.verdict: A 12-amp motor gives this corded electric chainsaw power for light and medium-duty jobs.
pros: Full wrap handle makes cutting at all angles easy
chain tension adjusts with external adjustment screw
cons: Chain jams with shavings, requiring work to stop and clear chain
Durability issues due to use of plastic parts in the motor

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 88 year old uncle so he would have something lightweight he could use. He was so excited when it arrived. Prepped it according to directions, started, and sparks flew and it quit. Thought it was just a fluke, so returned it for a second one. We tried it first at our house, and it worked, but brought it to uncle and it ran for 15 seconds and quit. Have to return that one also. SO disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s lightweight and NO GAS! Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use this today to trim low hanging and low to the ground tree branches greater 2 inch diameter. It was nice to plug it into an extension cord and started it by sliding the safety switch and holding a trigger. I cut down a dead sapling of about 3 inches. I think if I had a helper I could cut down a 4 or 5 inch tree trunk. Glad I bought it - not worried about getting it to start like we did with a gas powered one. My wood line adjacent to my home should be easier to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: marjala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chainsaw.  Exceeds expectations.  Easy starting!  : )
customer_reviews.text: My previous experience with electric chainsaws was not good. As in motor could barely power through anything larger than 4" without bogging down. I haven't gone crazy with this, but it handles 14" diameter trees with no problem with the full diameter being cut at once (don't have to "see-saw" the bar to make the cut). I bought it so my other half doesn't have to use the gas powered saw when I'm gone (trouble starting it). So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Gets Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Really like this saw. Second one I've had, but also second one that after a year or so of use has quit working, i.e. the motor spins but the chain won't activate. Can't find any service facilities that will repair electric chainsaws. Given that I like the saw and how it performs, this short shelf-life is a major frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Rex M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plastic gear inside saw stripped out second time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L Green

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes and it was melting and self destructing.
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Remington that lasted for many years. I hit a chain link fence and I tore up the gears. I decided to buy another one. I used this one for about 15 minutes and it started to smoke and it smelled like it was melting. This is not a good choice. Their quality has gone down significantly. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this electric chain saw. I used on 4"-6" diameter limbs and 18" - 20" diameter tree trunks. Cuts 'em like a hot knife through butter. These are cherry, black walnut, red-bud, pine, and maple trees. I am very happy with this chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Willis

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money. Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Metal drive gear inside broke into three pieces after only ten minutes of first use. Not good. Cheap parts and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great little chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: I had two of these before and have cut countless trees and assorted brush with them. They are perfect. So when they finally died I of course went and got the same kind. This is the perfect little chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: jai

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Used two times for approx 15 minutes. Clutch went out. What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: owned for 40 days and motor went up in smoke. WORTHLESS .
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: You got to love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I like every thing. It is light and surprisingly powerful. I cut thru (15) 12" dia dogwood logs this morning in about 20 minutes. Can't beat the price!!!! I burned up my first one that was about five years old and heavily abused. Only had to sharpen the chain periodically
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Chain come off to fast. Did everything that was ask. Oil levels, keep out of dirt. But chain come off to fast, hard to put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Just because it looks olike one doesn't mean it is one
customer_reviews.text: Item worked great right out of the box, Too bad it couldn't stand up to everyday use. unit died within three days. If you are cutting nothing bigger than a twig, I wouldn't buy this unit. My brother owns a smaller and older Remington electric chain saw, beats the pants off of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Friedel (Fred) Djordjevic

customer_reviews.title: loved it. Finally gave out
customer_reviews.text: I had a Remington for about 8 years....loved it. Finally gave out. Ordered another....junk...leaked oil all over. Ordered a second saw based on the first. Same deal...leaked oil and chain wouldn't adjust properly. Done with Remington saws forever.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Senior with a chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman and this is powerful chain saw. I am able to cut up a large limb without any problems. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Burned out very quickly. Waste of money. Very disappointed. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: At initial use I liked it until I smelled burning plastic and electrical. Smoke came out of the unit. Very disappointing. I liked the unit but the quality was not to Remington standards. I just used it to cut tree limbs and a tree with the diameter of 6”-7”. I thought this unit would be tougher and much more rugged than what it really was.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for the average home owner.
customer_reviews.text: Great little saw for your basic home projects. I bought this to cut some 4x4 posts down a few inches. Cut right through without a problem. Chain was tight out of the box. Make sure you buy the right oil! You must use Motor oil, not chain oil. Used it for 9 4x4 posts, couple of tree trimmings and haven't had any problems. Great saw for basic use and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this chainsaw for being electric. Cut right through some oak limbs I was cutting up for firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Watch for the smoke?
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time I used it,the motor burned up. How do I get my money back?
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Electric saw
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good product. As a woman way easy for me to use😊
customer_reviews.author: kimlene59

customer_reviews.title: I was quite disappointed that I have to go through the inconvenience of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chainsaw NEW, but when it arrived, it had very obviously been USED: scuff marks on the sides, grass and sawdust on the bottom, and oil on the bar. I was quite disappointed that I have to go through the inconvenience of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Linne

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this saw. Trying to find something he likes is nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Bship67

customer_reviews.title: Great electric chainsaw for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a 16-inch saw with enough power and a decent price. This is it. Used Remington's before and have liked them and like this one as well. Plenty of power and the weight is just right for this saw. Cuts very well and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Wimberley

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Returned it after it started leaking oil all over after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Philip George

customer_reviews.title: It broke right away
customer_reviews.text: It broke right away, and now iam stuck with it broken ..
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: Cuts really well. Made strong. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: karenRN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, low maintenance, powerful and light
customer_reviews.text: The chainsaw comes pre-assembled and basically you just have to fill it with oil and go. This works very well and it is very quiet. You don't have the noise and weight of a 2-stroke gas engine so it is much lighter and easier to manipulate. I used this one in the woods with my generator and it works great as well. Did not do any major tree cutting but it is good to trim down trees that have fallen after the storm or anything that does not require logger skills to put down. It comes with a complete manual that also explains the basics of cutting trees. Excellent product overall especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: FrogRacing

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR... SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Wore my other one out and it took a lot of abuse, so went with this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma's Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a friend. They are happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Sherile

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Saw arrived on time. It was easy to use, and met and surpassedmy expectations. The saw cut really well, and handled some larger cutttings with ease. Excellent purchase, and would definately recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this saw. I got it to take care branches and small trees due to Hurricane Irma, when I got it the package was in two parts one covering the blade and another box covering the engine part and handle area. Then we did a safety check and made sure all was good to go. We started the tree trimming and the lugs holding the cover plate and bottom of the blade started coming off, we tightened it again and within 10 minutes one was lost so needless to say I wouldn't recommend anyone buy this saw!
customer_reviews.author: Juan J. Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Great Saw
customer_reviews.text: This saw exceeded our expectations. It is larger and more durable that we initially. Thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased this year's ago!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Every bit as powerful as our old gas powered saw.
customer_reviews.author: jnette

customer_reviews.title: MY SECOND ONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE SECOND ONE I HAVE BOUGHT. I DO ALL FORMS OF WORK WITH IT, IN FACT I LIKED IT SO MUCH THAT WHEN I NEEDED A BIGGER GAS SAW FOR THE WOODS, I PURCHESED A REMINGTON ALSO.
customer_reviews.author: workshoptim

customer_reviews.title: Had problems pretty quickly. Also
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic chain tensioner. Had problems pretty quickly. Also, the oil reservoir did not feed the chain.
customer_reviews.author: i dont have a pen name

customer_reviews.title: Chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to finish cutting down a willow tree after our last one burned out. It is light for it's size, manageable, and very durable. My husband is excited with his new "toy", and looking for another tree to cut down!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to operate and does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: bought to replace one that a tree fell on. It actually still works somewhat. Easy for even my mom to use pam
customer_reviews.author: Lance Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Cuts good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I've had Remington electric chain saws before and both were stolen. I knew I liked them so I bought this one. It has plenty of power to cut tree limbs and branches easily. But...the electric plug is enclosed in a round half shroud, and the two polarized prongs are in the center of the shroud. Because the prongs are centered, modern three prong extension cords won't fit to plug it in. I needed to find a low profile, two prong to three prong adapter, and modify that a little to plug it in. I don't know why Remington didn't shape the shroud differently or not center the two prongs in it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it works better than I Expected I'm pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Drive sprocket is made of cheap plastic and wears out very fast even on medium hard jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnydel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INEXPENSIVE SAW
customer_reviews.text: WORKED WELL AS I HAVE ALREADY WORE OUT ONE AND I LIKED IT FOR NO MORE CUTTING THAN I DO
customer_reviews.author: Mike Loveall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dad likes it does the job wish it didnt leak so much oil. buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Jonnys

customer_reviews.title: These are great saws - even to cut down trees
customer_reviews.text: These are great saws - even to cut down trees, if they are 8" or smaller. This is my second one. We wore the other one out.
customer_reviews.author: bg1000

customer_reviews.title: Great saw! Even left it out in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Great saw! Even left it out in the rain. Still works. Oil drips out so store carefully. I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Mr EvanB

customer_reviews.title: The song was worth the price I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: The saw worked like it was supposed to and it work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: better than the one it replaced. also a Remington.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to see the Remington Quality of my purchase. I had a smaller and older saw that I also bought repair parts for but decided to get the newer model as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good little saw. My step son agrees with me. Very handy for around the place.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Bowman

customer_reviews.title: i want my money back
customer_reviews.text: this saw is a piece of garbage and broke immediately
customer_reviews.author: Russell Hebert

customer_reviews.title: ... of years (if you use it aggressively) Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: An inexpensive saw that needs replacing every couple of years (if you use it aggressively) Works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: my husband loved it, used it right away to cut a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, my husband loved it, used it right away to cut a small tree.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time and its awesome! Just add oil and plug and go. Very powerful and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Remington Chain Saw
customer_reviews.text: It has worked perfectly. No messy gas to worry about. Don't even have to pull a lever to oil the chain - it's automatic. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: old baldy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: More useful than I thought it would be. Great for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Remington Versa Saw is Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: This Remington Chainsaw has beat my expectations :) My husband has been sawing logs and even cutting trees down with ease :) I got this saw fast too :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts small limbs like butter.
customer_reviews.text: Surprises at the power. Cuts small limbs like butter. However , now that I have had it two years , a few flaws have showed up. This thing pours oil throughit , running or not. I have to store it over a box of sand to keep oil off the floor. I removed the gear and looked inside at the oil hoses. They look ok , but oil is leaking somewhere. I need an adjustment valve to regulate the oil!! Just finished my "Crepe Murder" for the year. Easy job with this saw , but my coveralls are soaked with oil.
customer_reviews.author: conned - sumer

customer_reviews.title: Beat Electric Chainsaw for Light to Moderate Use
customer_reviews.text: I got this chainsaw to cut wood for the BBQ pit and Firepit. I wasn't building a log cabin so I didn't want a big gas unit to fuss with. This chainsaw is perfect. It arrived on time and was packaged well. It was pretty much ready to go out of the box. I filled the chain oiler with bar oil and checked the tension of the chain. Plugged it in, and cut enough wood for the BBQ Pit and Firepit for the entire summer in two hours. It performed flawlessly. Cleaned it up and stored it away. Perfect for my use and the price was GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Remington 16 inch electric chain saw
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good electric chain saw. Hate the noisy gas chain saws. This little guy works/trims good. Constantly having to tighten the chain and add oil but that has been a normal chore with others I have bought and used on my property in the last 20 years. I would buy again and recommend this electric chainsaw. I have 2 1/2 acres of Junipers and trees to trim.
customer_reviews.author: djprutsman

customer_reviews.title: A great light-weight saw..
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light-weight saw and it has done a good job in keeping our trees pruned. It is a replacement for an older Remington electric that I used for years and have worn out with pretty heavy use. The nice thing about the saw is that it is slight enough to use for a couple hours without exhausting the operator. It is also strong enough to fell sizable trees that would normally call for a gas-powered saw. The oiler works well and does a good job of keeping the chain lubricated.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ford

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been great but I haven't gotten into any big logs yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. I'm first time user but no ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. I'm first time user but no problem in using at all. Did what I wanted it to do... cut the fallen tree in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sam T

customer_reviews.title: Second Remington chain saw - loved the first one and second one is better!
customer_reviews.text: We had our first Remington chain saw for several years and used it each season on downed wood from our yard. It worked so good we got the second one this season and are very happy with the way it handles and the upgraded motor capacity. Easy to use and perfect for small trees, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: great chain saw
customer_reviews.text: great chain saw. I used this saw cut down a tree diameter about 14" very quick and easy. don't trust the negtive reviews. this chain saw is very easy to use,
customer_reviews.author: Kin Tam

customer_reviews.title: Great product and performs greatly
customer_reviews.text: Great product and performs greatly. The saw comes ready to use. Only add chain oil and plug into an extension cord and it`s ready to go
customer_reviews.author: Garland Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice saw. It runs well and relatively quiet. Easy to understand directions. Was well packaged and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: mark w joralemon

customer_reviews.title: Read the manual and tried it out and it was easy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newbie. Read the manual and tried it out and it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Corvus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: no emergency stop very noisy good for the small jobs
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kerckhove

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Met all my expectations: weight, ease of use, ability to cut cord wood.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Edelman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to imagine an electric chain so with so much ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to imagine an electric chain so with so much power. Takes care of any task around the house. I am not going to be cutting down mature trees but it sure fills the bill for everything else
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Defective Electric Chain Saw
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these item thinking it will do the work to remove an small tree; the unit don't event last one hour running when the bearing get damages (when I open the box I did add oil in to the reservoir to lubricate the chain saw)... However I was able to return it for an exchange; the new unit is being storage till next job. If want to consider this chain saw is not for constant use! That is my experience with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ... cutting down a 15 inch tree and it worked fine. It does use a lot of 30w oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I just finished cutting down a 15 inch tree and it worked fine. It does use a lot of 30w oil so always check the level. The new chain will slack up after the first few minutes so you'll have to tighten soon after use.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good saw for a small person.
customer_reviews.text: This saw is great! Not too heavy for me and doesn't vibrate like a Sawszall. I found some natural chain oil - organic oils which is working great since the directions say do not use petroleum based oil.
customer_reviews.author: arsinoe

customer_reviews.title: Handy yard tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool will cut/trim any tree from 1" up to 12" with ease. If maintained it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good saw but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace another little electric saw that I had and it's much heavier than my first one. My fault though I didn't pay much attention to the weight that was listed. Works well though so we're keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri K.

customer_reviews.title: Oil leak
customer_reviews.text: Mine leaked oil profusely out of the bottom the first time I used it. I opened it up and the oil line was just hanging inside the casing spewing oil on the interior, but not a drop of oil on the blade. The connector post was damaged but I managed to get it attached and now it works.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Reiser

customer_reviews.title: Haven't opened it yet, still using the older one.
customer_reviews.text: This model is probably like the three that I bought prior to this one. All of them have been easy to work on by an old duffer like me.
customer_reviews.author: Allen K. Heacock

customer_reviews.title: A D for Durability!
customer_reviews.text: The motor burned out while I was cutting up a 10" diameter tree on the first day! I had an identical model before this one, but the chain tightening mechanism kept breaking through the plastic edges that held it in place. I replaced those parts, but then the starter switch stopped working, and I couldn't get that part replaced. Since I had just bought a new chain and blade and the tightening parts, I bought another saw (it's big advantage is price: $79) thinking that I could at least use the parts when the new one wore out. Bad decision!
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a gift. It looks like it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Smith

customer_reviews.title: electric chain saw
customer_reviews.text: It is a good saw, my husband loves it. The blade is much bigger than most electric saws. I got here on the exact day it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Debra McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Remington RM1635W 16-inch 12-Amp Electric Chain Saw
customer_reviews.text: Just had this item for a few weeks. I was able to cut a few small branches in a tree close to my home. I was able to remove branches hovering over my mobile home. I always wanted this item it was given to me for a birthday gift. Best gift thus so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chain Saw
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 84 yrs old and still works on our farm. He needed a lighter weight, easy to handle chain saw to trim trees in the orchard. The RM1635W we purchased from Amazon is a winner. He is very satisfied with this product would recommend this one for trimming trees, bushes and shrubs. w
customer_reviews.author: June kucks

customer_reviews.title: one tough saw
customer_reviews.text: this thing is amazing. after a tree fell on my house i used this saw to completely remove the foilage which had a trunk about 28 inches.
customer_reviews.author: llopedogg

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Didn't pay a whole lot for it so for what I paid it was a good value. No real problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Canon

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Cuts well does not leak oil. Note you have to put in motor oil SAE 30 not regular oil.Have yet to try it on thicker trees. To date have tried it on tree trunks less than 6 inches in diameter Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I do like this chainsaw, but the model that was sent was not the model shown in the photo. I bought it to replace one I had that had died. It was supposed to be the same saw but was not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of s***
customer_reviews.text: One star only cause there was NOT a zero available complete piece of s***!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Too big and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have never used it. I ordered it, and when it came, just the weight of it was more than I could handle. I'm sure some strong person could handle it just fine, but I went back to my chain saw.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Judy

product_meta.title: Remington RM1645 Versa Saw 12 Amp 16-Inch Electric Chainsaw with Automatic Chain with Auto Oiler-Soft-Touch Grip and Hand Guard, 32.80 x 9.80 x 8.80, Orange
product_meta.description: The Remington RM1645 Versa Saw 12 Amp 16" Chainsaw is a multi-use, lightweight, high performance machine with a 12 Amp electric motor ideal for trimming and pruning limbs and branches in addition to other clean up tasks. The Remington Versa Saw has all the conveniences needed to make yard clean up quick and easy. The lightweight, ergonomic design and overmold comfort handle provides lightweight, balanced and low vibration during operation. Compact design provides maximum maneuverability and fits perfectly into those hard-to-reach spaces and even makes trimming hedges and bushes quick and easy, without the need for refills or gas. The 16" low-kickback bar and chain allow for improved cutting performance, while the side-mounted tensioning system saves time and ensures chain tension stays consistent, as chain adjustments are quickly made while working. The auto oiler system maintains the proper amount of lubricant on the chain, helps to keep the chain sharp, in addition to ensuring the saw cuts smoothly and safely. Quick view clear window for oil visibility ensures you know when to refill. Chain break included for optimal safety during usage. This low-noise, lightweight chainsaw is ready go to with the pull of the trigger and is ideal for trimming branches, pruning limbs, shaping hedges, and cleaning out bushes. Backed by a 2-year limited warranty. With the RM1645 Versa Saw 12 Amp 16" Chainsaw not only will you have quality lawn equipment that is reliable, easy-to-use, and powerful, but with Remington, you will have a Yard Well Done.
feature_bullets: POWERFUL ELECTRIC MOTOR: Reliable and durable 12 amp electric motor for fast cutting with a 16-Inch reduced-kickback guide bar and chain.
VERSATILE USE: Compact, yet powerful size for all your clean up needs. Whether it is lawn care, yard work, wood trimming, or other outdoor projects, this chainsaw is battle tested and battle ready.
LIGHTWEIGHT WITH ERGO HANDLE: Ergonomic design with overmold comfort handle provides lightweight, balanced and low vibration operation giving you optimal comfortability and command during use.
AUTO CHAIN OILER WITH EASY VIEW: Keeps the proper amount of lubricant on the chain to ensure the saw cuts smoothly and safely. Oil level viewer shows when oil is to be added
QUICK-ADJUST CHAIN TENSION: Handy external tensioning screw can be quickly adjusted to keep machine running at peak performance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars269 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
